data.text: Did you know in Mexico Christmas celebrations mainly take place on Christmas Eve? It's the time when families get together to enjoy a special dinner and celebrate this much anticipated holiday. Feliz Navidad! https://t.co/ql2ieuVYAe
Christmas is all around in Mexico! Have you been to San Miguel? https://t.co/eA2SfMy5LU
Tis' the season for... a traditional Mexican hot chocolate! Pair it with a "concha" sweet bread for an explosion of traditional flavors. https://t.co/LKgOM9wXKB

data.text: @MEAnderson88 Marie, please through the email amcustomersupport@aeromexico.com send the credit card statement where the charges are shown. It is important tha the statement is issued by the bank since screenshots from app or webs are not acceptable. *HS
@naomicalhoun Naomi, please through Whatsapp +52 55 5133 4000 share with us your baggage claim. We will gladly verify them. *HS
@mariatellaa Hello! Please provide us with your reservation number via DM. We are at your service. * GP

@melierincones Hello, please, send a WhatsApp message to +5255 5133 4000 entering the word AYUDA, and provide the agent with your reservation code to follow up. WA League ES: https://t.co/2FDVaYaKg8 * GP

@Justindpilot Hi, Justin! We apologize for this delay and the lack of information. According to our system this flight is scheduled to depart at 8:45 p.m. Please approach one of our gate agents to further confirm. *GV
@GuiltyPleasur_e Hi, Alexis! We are sorry you have experienced hardships throughout your trip. Please share with us more details regarding this matter through DM. *GV
@JMartinDalgleis Hello, in this case please share with us through DM your reservation code. we will gladly verify it. *HS
@_hiijess Hello, please through Whatsapp +52 55 5133 4000 share with us your baggage tag. We are going to verify the situation. *HS
@JoseAValencia8 @JoseAValencia8. Please send us in a DM the information of your reservation or the case number to review it *MT
@viribar @viribar  Agradecemos tu preocupación, para dar seguimiento de manera efectiva en necesario que el pasajero nos contacte vía DM y con gusto daremos asistencia *MT
@allthelvlylttls Your case was created successfully yesterday, an executive from our luggage team will be in contact with you in the next days. *AA
@allthelvlylttls @allthelvlylttls Please provide us with your lost luggage report number to review it *MT

Learn more:https://t.co/OhhXqeWN3U https://t.co/crJTRpV9kx
